data.comment: Today's referee, Antony Gautier, has blown to start the match.
Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Nice.
In the minute 5, Montpellier push forward at Stade de la Mosson and Gaetan Laborde gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Nice defence.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Nice have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Nice at Stade de la Mosson.
Antony Gautier awards Nice a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Teji Savanier (Montpellier) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Antony Gautier signals a throw-in for Montpellier, close to Nice's area.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 12, Montpellier's Mihailo Ristic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Nice goal kick.
Free kick Nice.
In the minute 14, Montpellier's Andy Delort gets in a shot on goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gaetan Laborde's header is off-target for Montpellier.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Montpellier Montpellier drive forward through Gaetan Laborde. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ball safe as Nice is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier close to the penalty box.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Gaetan Laborde.
In the minute 18, Andy Delort instrumental with a fine assist.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in the half of Nice.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kasper Dolberg (Nice) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 23, Antony Gautier awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 25, Gaetan Laborde (Montpellier) strikes at Stade de la Mosson but his header is cleared.
Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Hassane Kamara of Nice gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
In the minute 28, Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nice.
In the minute 30, Antony Gautier signals a Nice throw-in in Montpellier's half.
Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
Nice to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
In the minute 31, Montpellier have a goal kick.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
Throw-in Montpellier.
In the minute 34, Montpellier have a dangerous throw-in.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Nice get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montpellier's half?
In the minute 38, Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Antony Gautier signals a Montpellier throw-in in Nice's half.
Myziane Maolida for Nice has been booked by Antony Gautier and receives a first yellow card.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Antony Gautier has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the away team in Montpellier.
Nice make their first substitution with Alexis Claude-Maurice replacing Kephren Thuram Ulien.
In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nice's Alexis Claude-Maurice breaks free at Stade de la Mosson. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 48, Goal kick for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Andy Delort for Montpellier drives towards goal at Stade de la Mosson. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 49, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Montpellier just outside Nice's area.
Montpellier have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Goal! Daniel Congre extends Montpellier's lead to 2-0 in Montpellier with a header.
In the minute 50, Teji Savanier with an assist there.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nice.
Nice drive upfield and Pierre Lees-Melou gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Montpellier defender.
In the minute 53, Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nice's half?
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Nice in their own half.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Montpellier to take a throw-in in Nice territory.
In the minute 56, Free kick in a good position for Montpellier!
In Montpellier, Teji Savanier of Montpellier is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 59, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Montpellier's Gaetan Laborde goes close with a header against the bar.
Nice have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Antony Gautier awards the home team a throw-in.
Nice needs to be cautious. Montpellier have an attacking throw-in.
Teji Savanier of Montpellier smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Great finish from Daniel Congre to give Montpellier a 3-0 lead.
Amine Gouiri is replacing Myziane Maolida for the away team.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Teji Savanier with Junior Sambia. This is the first substitution made today by Michel Der Zakarian.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Nice in the half of Montpellier.
Free kick Nice.
Montpellier are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 69, Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-1 through a header from Dante.
That's a fine assist from Amine Gouiri.
Throw-in for Montpellier in the half of Nice.
In the minute 70, Nice awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nice to take a throw-in in Montpellier territory.
Nice are coming forward and Kasper Dolberg gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Nice.
In the minute 73, Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
The home team replace Jordan Ferri with Joris Chotard.
Throw-in for Nice at Stade de la Mosson.
Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nice's half?
In the minute 75, In Montpellier a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in high up the field for Nice in Montpellier.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 77, Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Throw-in Nice.
Nice awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Montpellier's Andy Delort is on target but unsuccessful.
Patrick Vieira (Nice) is making a third substitution, with Dan Ndoye replacing Rony Lopes.
In the minute 82, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Kasper Dolberg (Nice) has received a yellow card from Antony Gautier.
Corner awarded to Montpellier.
In the minute 84, Throw-in Nice.
Ambroise Oyongo is replacing Mihailo Ristic for Montpellier at Stade de la Mosson.
Michel Der Zakarian is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade de la Mosson with Stephy Mavididi replacing Andy Delort.
In the minute 84, Keagan Dolly is on a sub for Arnaud Souquet for Montpellier.
Antony Gautier signals a free kick to Nice in their own half.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, In Montpellier Montpellier attack through Stephy Mavididi. The finish is off target, however.
Antony Gautier awards Nice a goal kick.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
In the minute 89, Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Youcef Atal with Eddy Sylvestre.
At Stade de la Mosson the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Antony Gautier signals a Nice throw-in in Montpellier's half.
Corner awarded to Nice.
Nice have been awarded a corner by Antony Gautier.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Nice will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Montpellier.
The match has come to a close in Montpellier. The final score is 3-1.
